aom.scripting.ui.console

Class AIDebug

  • Object
    • AIDebug

  • public class AIDebug
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning AI Debugging.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
    Local Call
    AI Debug commands are all local.
